titles.title: Commemorating the 100th anniversary of Midwestern State University to honor the university's rich history and celebrate its vibrant presence.
Commemorating the 100th anniversary of Midwestern State University to honor the university's rich history and celebrate its vibrant presence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes and extends congratulations to the education professionals, students, and alumni of Midwestern State University for 100 years of excellence in higher education.
